page.title: 06Deptford Fire Station
page.content: The Fire station In Deptford Is In. Evelyn Street. It was Built In 1903. It Is a four story building. There are 50 firemen, divided into four watches:-red, blue, green and white. In the fire station there is television room, a recreation room, where the firemen play snooker, a gymnasium and a mess. A mess is where the firemen eat.A typical day for a fireman starts at 9 a.m.with roll call in full gear. Then the equipment on the fire engines (call machines) is checked.At 11a.m. it is stand easy, which is what the firemen call teabreak. During the day watches the firemen have drills where they practice putting out fires. they also keep fit in the gym and by playing volley-ball and football.
